title: Disability Access, Energy Efficient HVAC, Easy Access to Interstates
posting_body: ['At South Glen Apartments, our legendary service, incredible value, and warm community spirit are designed to offer you a superior living experience.', 'Each home in South Glen has both front and back window exposure providing a light, airy atmosphere.', ' A landscaped courtyard accents the front of each building cluster while large expanses of open space separate each court, assuring backyard privacy.', 'Located in Brownstown Township, between Allen Road and Fort Street provides direct access to nearby schools, shopping centers and major employers.', '-Community', 'Park', '-Linen Closet', '-Window Coverings', '-Washer/Dryer', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Resident Lounge with Free Wi-Fi', '-New/Renovated Interior', '-Basement', '-Disability Access', '-Central Air Conditioning', '-Onsite Storage Available', '-High Speed Internet Access', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
